reviews.review:
This is bullshit, ranking is awful, I´ve been playing for 270 hours and I still can´t rank up to GN1 because I always get in matches where my entire team doesn´t listen to a shit, matchmaking is also crap because of smurfs.
Just bullshit, the game is awesome but matchmaking not, I don´t consider myself a professional player, but I can say that I´m good enough for GN1 but I hate being stuck in silver because of some kids that have no idea how to play it or some russians playing Cheeki Breeki in the fucking chat, or some smurfs from GN3, or some assholes which don´t listen to your advices, or some dickheads that insult you for no reason.
crap
Good game, im silver elite and proud of it :))))

Matchmaking is unplayable.
FACEIT is pretty much the new matchmaking and that still sucks at times.
Fun game, but it's gone downhill a lot community-wise (nothing but cheaters and smurfs in matchmaking). 

If there was a neutral vote, I'd do that, because honestly I don't think new players would enjoy this game, but the veterans still might. 

6.9/10
